title: COVID-19 Public Health Update: CDC Recommends Additional Vaccine Dose for Immunocompromised | Syracuse University News
author: News Staff
description: Dear Students, Families, Faculty and Staff: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) issued new guidance yesterday that will impact members of our community. The CDC is now encouraging individuals who are moderately or severely immunocompromised to receive...
cleaned_text: The term "boot camp" might call to mind visions of military recruits crawling through mud under barbed wire at 4 a.m. on a sticky summer day. The Newhouse School's version of boot camp doesn't come close to demanding that level...
